headline: GM Had a Record Month of EV Sales. A ‘Collapse’ Is Coming.
summary: General Motors  reported a big month selling electric vehicles in the U.S., giving the market a piece of good news underpinned by bad news.  It was “an all-time monthly record in August, as customers rushed to make purchases ahead of the expiration of Federal EV tax credits,” GM said in a news release.  GM has several popular EV models, including the Chevy Equinox, Cadillac LYRIQ, and GMC Sierra pickup truck.

headline: What Does Wall Street Think About General Motors Company (GM)?
summary: General Motors Company (NYSE:GM) is one of the best affordable growth stocks to buy. On August 19, Wedbush raised the firm’s price target on General Motors Company (NYSE:GM) to $65 from $55, keeping an Outperform rating on the shares. The analyst told investors that General Motors Company’s (NYSE:GM) logistics strategies and production relocation should soften […]

headline: How to play F1 popularity: Liberty Media, Netflix, GM
summary: After talking with Formula One owner and Liberty Media founder and chairman John Malone, Yahoo Finance Executive Editor Brian Sozzi examines how to invest in the competitive racing business. The Opening Bid Host, Crossmark Global Investments chief market strategist Victoria Fernandez, and Yahoo Finance Senior Reporter Ines Ferré discuss investing in Liberty Media (FWONK) and names with exposure to F1's success, like Netflix (NFLX) and automaker General Motors (GM). Check out Opening Bid Unfiltered's full interview with Liberty Media founder John Malone. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Opening Bid.

headline: 3 Reasons GM is Risky and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: General Motors’s 23.8% return over the past six months has outpaced the S&P 500 by 13.4%, and its stock price has climbed to $58.68 per share. This performance may have investors wondering how to approach the situation.
